name: Gengo Café
description:
We are two students at the University of Plymouth studying BSc (Hons) Computing & Games Development. We both love gamification and education, so for one of our final year modules we decided how about we smash the two together and make and educational game. We both have language based backgrounds so decided to make Gengo Café! 

Luke specialises in all things techy and making sure the game works properly!

Amelia specialises in all things arty and makes sure the game looks nice and the design flows.

CREDITS

Developer: Luke Jansen

Art & Language Expert: Amelia Cutler
